subject: Re: [junit] Request for feedback: JUnit + Hamcrest 1.3
msgSnippet: All, there s now a beta snapshot available on https://github.com/KentBeck/junit/downloads Direct link:
messageBody:
All,

there's now a beta snapshot available on
https://github.com/KentBeck/junit/downloads

Direct link: https://github.com/downloads/KentBeck/junit/junit-4.11-SNAPSHOT-20120416-1530.jar

If you use JUnit and Hamcrest in your project, we kindly ask for your help to try to compile and run your tests using this snapshot version. If you find any problems, please provide feedback through this mailing list or by adding a comment to the corresponding pull request [1].

Thanks for your help in advance!

Marc

[1] https://github.com/KentBeck/junit/pull/404
